title: Prepare
description:
Steps complete. You're aligned, grounded,
and ready. <0>Trust yourself tonight.</0>
hydration-description:
Start with water or electrolytes to
support your body and minimize 
alcohol's impact.
self-hypnosis-description:
A 3-5 minute audio session to
reinforce your intentions and engage
your subconscious mind.
mantra-description:
Repeat your chosen mantra whenever
you need to refocus and stay in
control.
